name: Fire Unlocked!
description:
Welcome to the dark world of our ancestors and the moment fire was discovered! Guide our brave adventurer back to his village to keep the light alive in the world, but watch out for the high winds that threaten to kill the light and send you and your people back into darkness.

This is our first Game Jam, Ludum Dare #46 "Keep it alive", and there was a lot to learn. This game now has a level editor (of sorts) and lots of possibility, but it's very rudimentary now. 

Next up are:
- Sprite level switching (which sprite should be in front of which)
- Health bar
- Attractor Screen
- Enemy generators
- Power ups
- Recharging
- More enemies
- Better sprites
- More levels in different settings
- The village celebration
- Much more!

Have fun and feel free to share your ideas!
